mapper.select: select * from shop_order t where id=#{params.id} and name=#{params.name}

select id,name as shopItemName,amount,t.price from shop_item si JOIN (SELECT shop_item_id,sum(amount) as amount,sum(price) as price FROM `shop_order` GROUP BY shop_item_id) t on si.id = t.shop_item_id ORDER BY t.price DESC limit 8
